channel.title: CVE Feed for Autodesk -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Autodesk -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-23132|2024-03-17T23:47:35.189Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted STP file in atf_dwg_consumer.dll when parsed through Autodesk AutoCAD could lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability in conjunction with other vulnerabilities could lead to code execution in the context of the current process.
